EmailTemplate.name: Final Reminder 9 Days Later - Pinnacle
EmailTemplate.subject: Don't Forget About The Property Website?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
I hope this email finds you well. This will be a final reminder from Luxury Presence regarding the property website for [Property Address]. Please make sure to...
Review the website ➡️ View Here Approve/submit edits ➡️ Click Here
Please note that the monthly subscription starts 30 days after your order submission. Let us know if you have any questions.
We look forward to getting your property website online!
Best,
Self Serve Property Websites Luxury Presence Phone: (310) 955-1077 Email: support@luxurypresence.com
